0.text:
Just as World War II was the defining event for my parents’ generation, the COVID-19 pandemic will define the generations living through it right now.

In our new Annual Letter, Melinda and I talk about how we hope the experience we’ve all lived through over the last year will lead to a long-term change in the way people think about global health.

GATESNOTES.COM
The year global health went local

1.text: A lot has changed over the last 25 years (like the connected technology that has transformed society). A lot hasn’t (like my wardrobe): https://gatesnot.es/2Jnn0JR
1.post_text: A lot has changed over the last 25 years (like the connected technology that has transformed society). A lot hasn’t (like my wardrobe): https://gatesnot.es/2Jnn0JR

2.text: There’s a lot that we still don’t know about Alzheimer’s, but I’m hopeful that will change soon thanks in part to the Alzheimer’s Disease Data Initiative. ADDI will simplify how researchers and data scientists around the world work together and share knowledge: https://gatesnot.es/3kLOGow
2.post_text: There’s a lot that we still don’t know about Alzheimer’s, but I’m hopeful that will change soon thanks in part to the Alzheimer’s Disease Data Initiative. ADDI will simplify how researchers and data scientists around the world work together and share knowledge: https://gatesnot.es/3kLOGow

3.text: I’m teaming up with Rashida Jones for a new podcast limited series starting Monday. Each week, we’ll talk about some of the biggest issues facing our world with special guests including authors, experts, and friends: https://gatesnot.es/3krA8uf

GATESFOUNDATION.ORG
We can end COVID-19. Together.

Gates Foundation
15 September 2020 at 05:30 ·

What the world does in the next few months is going to make a big difference. Read our 2020 Goalkeepers Report to learn what it will take to end the pandemic.

7.text: Better and cheaper batteries will hopefully make electric vehicles a realistic option for every car owner. QuantumScape (which I’m invested in both on my own and through Breakthrough Energy Ventures) is developing an exciting solution to this challenge: https://gatesnot.es/2Z567IO

8.text:
Our foundation is partnering with DonorsChoose to support teachers as they get ready to go back to school—in whatever form that takes—and will boost your donations to the classroom project of your choice today.

DONORSCHOOSE.ORG
DonorsChoose: Support a classroom. Build a future.

9.text:
This hero is playing a critical role in Kenya’s preparations to tackle COVID-19 by scaling up medical oxygen supplies that will be needed to keep the most critically ill patients alive.

Breathing new hope into Africa’s fight against COVID-19
